# Play with Seam

Play with Seam code snippets inside of vs code from the comfort of Docker.

![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1910070/271142747-cef8d002-3eaa-42f5-9ec4-f46b9018b857.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Ue9PS_oaLM8SodJoojt_k5DCN5wb4gIEfOMPJ1HCkok)

## Usage

```
docker run -p 3000:3000 seamapi/play-with-seam
```

Now open [localhost:3000](https://localhost:3000) in your browser!
